name: Burning Light (NobelFabio, Payce2Space, Kyrowo, Dimi Tree, MsPanda, itswhitegoat, Mabuschka, Denjil404, first_twini)
name_original: Burning Light (NobelFabio, Payce2Space, Kyrowo, Dimi Tree, MsPanda, itswhitegoat, Mabuschka, Denjil404, first_twini)
description:
On earth, far in the future, we are prisoners of our own lives.

In these times of hardship, we no longer have any hope for a better future.

The actions I have taken are really the only thing we can do ....isn't it?

After all, anything is better than being kept alive by THEM without any right to decide for our own.

So I'm going to do it.

It is the only right thing we can do. 

There is no other way.

......... right?

Made for Global Game Jam 2022 

All Assets were made during the  Game Jam 

Controls: WASD = Movement STRG, Shift, C = Crouch E = Interact Left Mouse = Shoot Light Right Mouse = Suck Light
